title: "Neon Nightscapes"
content:
# Neon Nightscapes

Welcome to Neon Nightscapes, a website dedicated to showcasing stunning neon-colored interpretations of the night sky. Our collection features a variety of vibrant and electrifying images that capture the beauty and mystery of the cosmos.

Explore our gallery to discover unique and mesmerizing depictions of stars, galaxies, and celestial phenomena. Each image is carefully selected for its striking use of color and captivating composition.

Whether you're an astronomy enthusiast or simply appreciate beautiful art, Neon Nightscapes offers something for everyone. So sit back, relax, and immerse yourself in the neon glow of the universe.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A neon-colored interpretation of a starry sky"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
